# W-Table

A webcomponent table.

## Features (WIP)
- columns
    - sortable ✅
    - customizable header ✅
    - flex width ✅
- pivot
    - customizable grouping ✅
    - customizable group header ✅
- filter
    - filter items ❌
- pagination ✍️

## Check it out

```
npm i
npm start
npm run storybook
```

open [http://localhost:9001/](http://localhost:9001/)
